titleStmt.title: A copy of the decree wherein two bookes of Roger Widdrington an English Cathotholick [sic] are condemned, and the author commanded to purge himselfe: and a copy of the purgation which the same Roger Widdrington sent to his Holinesse Pope Paul the fift. Translated out of Latine into English by the author, whereunto he hath also adioined an admonition to the reader concerning the Reply of T.F. &c. and the condemnation of Fa: Suarez booke by a decree of the Parliament of Paris.
Exemplar decreti. English
titleStmt.author: Preston, Thomas, 1563-1640.

titleStmt.title: A copy of the decree wherein two bookes of Roger Widdrington an English Cathotholick [sic] are condemned, and the author commanded to purge himselfe: and a copy of the purgation which the same Roger Widdrington sent to his Holinesse Pope Paul the fift. Translated out of Latine into English by the author, whereunto he hath also adioined an admonition to the reader concerning the Reply of T.F. &c. and the condemnation of Fa: Suarez booke by a decree of the Parliament of Paris.
Exemplar decreti. English
titleStmt.author: Preston, Thomas, 1563-1640.

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: Roger Widdrington (pseudonym of Thomas Preston).
A translation of: Preston, Thomas. Exemplar decreti.
"A copy of Roger Widdringtons purgation" has caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
